channel.title: Black Dragons
channel.description: So, i've killed about 300 Black dragons now, and no vissage, any-one know around how many i'll have to kill for vissage? :)

item.title: Black Dragons
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Go talk to that osiach dude in edgeville it actually rises the rate (with your anti d shield). You don’t need to use it for the higher chance but as long as you talk to him.
Black drags from personal experiance are a bunch of crap, just do iron drags or something and if you get a vissy hey nice but the odds are really low. There worth a lot of a reason, they’d be worth more if d defender didn’t completely pwn vissy’s for melee.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Dragons
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

I think it’s all random. I’ve gone through so many irons, steels and black but never gotten any.

Weeks later, i got a skeletal wyverns task and on my… 7-8th kill, visage. Too bad it’s price was going down and it was already cheap so i call it a worthless drop.
And that was the first time i’ve killed those creatures.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Dragons
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

If I recall a visage from a Black is 1:16k, so you’d have to kill around 30k to guarantee one. I’ve gotten one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

As said before, its luck. 99 slayer and never received a visage.

All drops are percentaged luck

item.title: Black Dragons
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:8, topic:405264”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=502257.msg3674542#msg3674542 date=1311166932]
I don’t believe you killed any black dragons, Seeing as you lie to much.
[/quote]Lie? Haha. There are no drop rates for visages or any other items on the drop tables, it’s just made up. In the end, it all comes down to luck. I only got about 34M from the visage (the med price was 39M back then) because no one would buy it on GE, so I made it into a DFS and sold for a few mills loss, but still free money :p[/quote]I meant killing the black dragons in general, Not the drop rate ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Black Dragons
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:6, topic:405264”]I don’t believe you killed any black dragons, Seeing as you lie to much.[/quote]Lie? Haha. There are no drop rates for visages or any other items on the drop tables, it’s just made up. In the end, it all comes down to luck. I only got about 34M from the visage (the med price was 39M back then) because no one would buy it on GE, so I made it into a DFS and sold for a few mills loss, but still free money

Read full topic
